title: Bungee-Reconnect插件问题
author: Leng_FengDaDa
txt_content:
BC端装了Bungee-Reconnect这个插件登录服可以短线重连，但是mod服却不能
请问这是怎么回事，要怎么解决!

replies.author: 没糖的葫芦
replies.txt_content:
本插件以支持:1.7 1.8 1.9的BC端
这个插件只支持BC...

replies.author: Leng_FengDaDa
replies.txt_content:
